summary: This is a simple mod, my first, that makes it so Dragon Heart Scales have value and a purpose.
descriptionHtml:
Dragon Heartscales have Value! Version 1.2

[i]Kindly Endorse/Rate if you use this mod in your game, please. Thanks!![/i]

This is my first mod, and a very BIG thanks to Sir Edhelsereg!! I mean it, we've gotten to be good friends. I also ENCOURAGE you all to check out his Mods. He has some very excellent Mods to share!

So Dragon Heartscale Have Value? How?

This mod makes it so you can create powerful Dragon Heartscale Arrows, but they are NOT cheap and you only get 5 per Dragon Heartscale.

... You also need Kahvozein's Fang to harvest the Scales.
See: http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Kahvozein's_Fang

You have to have the:

>>[b][i] DRAGON SMITHING PERK TO CREATE THESE.[/i][/b] for obvious reasons. <<<

The cost to create the Dragon Heartscale Arrows?
1 – Dragon Heartscale
1 – Ebony Ingot
1 – Silver Ingot
1 – Fire Salts
1 – Frost Salts
1 – Daedra Heart

You get 5 Dragon Heartscale Arrows with a Damage of 50. These are not your vanilla Skyrim Arrows! They came from the Heartscales of a Dragon!

Yes, 50 and here is why: You went through Dragon Attacks, Dragon Priest Attacks, Fire and Frost and Blood, Sweat and tears to get those Dragon Heartscales!

Unlike Jarrin Root, where a gal dressed in Leather just gave one to you.

It’s not as powerful as Jarrin Root, but dang close, which brings me to the other use for Dragon Heartscales!

Another Thanks to: Bluarchon and yes check out his Mods too. He gave me the ‘focal point’ of how to create: Dragon Heartscale Ash, an Alchemy agent.

Originally I was going to do this at a MILL, but realized just how few they are and that would just be ‘annoying’ to me as a player. So the Smelter was the next best call ….

The Dragon Heartscale Alchemy Agent does the following:

[b]DAMAGE HEALTH[/b] – just a tad less than Jarrin Root, but just as DEADLY!
[b]RESIST FROST[/b] - Almost Dragon Strength, but not quite.
[b]RESIST FIRE[/b] - Almost Dragon Strength, but not quite.
[b]DAMAGE MAGICA.[/b]

[b][u]ADDED: 12/07/2013[/u][/b]

Dragon Heartscale Arrow Tips now [i]glow[/i] – so they are hopefully easier to find.

[b][u]Dragon Heartscale Ring of Protection:[/u][/b]

This ring protects you from 75% damage protection from Fire and Frost Attacks, but again – This RING is not cheap and thus makes it worth it.

>> You NEED Dragon Armor Smithing Perk to Make this.

INGREDIENTS:
1 – Dragon Heartscale Ash
1 – Dragon’s Tongue
1 – Fire Salts
1 – Frost Salts
1 – Gold Ingot
1 – GRAND Soul Gem >FILLED<
1 – Slaughter Fish Scales

[b][u]Dragon Heartscale Light Shield of Protection:[/u][/b]

This Shield, like the Ring, offers 75/75 from Fire and Frost attacks, but like the Ring and the Arrows – it does not come cheap!

You need the DRAGON ARMOR PERK to make this shield.

1 – Dragon Heartscale Ash
1 – Dragon’s Tongue
1 – Ebony Ingot
1 – Fire Salts
1 – Frost Salts
1 – GRAND Soul Gem >FILLED<
1 – Leather Strips
1 – Slaughter Fish Scales

[b][u]To Do:[/u][/b]
As I grow in my Mod Creation Experience, I will create a special Arrow and Shield for this. Right now I just used the Daedric Arrow to get this Mod going.

Also might create: Armor and Weapons *IF* there is enough Endorsements to call for the commitment to 'go there' ...

I did my best to keep this “Lore Friendly” and balanced as is possible.
